website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality trumpet available at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Includes an adjustable thumb rest for added comfort
Brass body, bell, and lead pipe provide outstanding quality
Comes with case and cleaning kit
cons: May be tough to find replacement parts for the trumpet

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Very very beginner, which is fine for an 11 year old. Sucky thing is the buttons stick really really bad even with valve oil! So we will be purchasing a new trumpet because this one actually frustrates my son due to the note sounding off.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased here. 1st one was 4 years back. My son is now really good at trumpet and plays jazz band. He plays his friends nicer ones and says “dad they all sound the same. You just gotta play.” Great value and will buy a 3rd one if he doesn’t buy his own by then.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Our son is still using this every school day after 3.5 years
customer_reviews.text: This is the trumpet we bought our kid when he was starting out in 5th grade band. We leave this trumpet at school and have a slightly more expensive one at home. The one at home doesn't have the same tone and my son says there's something slightly with it. He always prefers to practice on this one. It's been a great starter.
customer_reviews.author: ovtomatohead

customer_reviews.title: Works well and nice case. No
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for band. Works well and nice case. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jitterbug

customer_reviews.title: ... music lessons and he and his 3 brothers just love it. It may be a bit large for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trumpet for my 7yr old grandson to begin music lessons and he and his 3 brothers just love it. It may be a bit large for him but he is doing it! I have not seen it but they all tell me it's beautiful and sounds perfect for a first time player. Their dad took lessons as a kid and he is happy with it also! They now have a piano, trumpet and guitar, next will be drumbs...lol
customer_reviews.author: SNeither

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality trumpet. I did not have any issue with it quality wise and the case is unique enough that my kid never confuses it with anyone elses
customer_reviews.author: James Aubrey Fields

customer_reviews.title: Much better alternative than renting from the local dealer!
customer_reviews.text: works well and my kid likes it. Teacher tells me it is great starter to four years of playing. Will have to invest in better one for high school but perfect for my fourth grader
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: It is sad because my little neighbor who is just starting out
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet has been a nightmare. The valves stick and cannot be used. I am returning it as defective. It is sad because my little neighbor who is just starting out, had no idea the instrument was defective and is now not liking to play!
customer_reviews.author: MadMary

customer_reviews.title: great 1st trumpet for a 1st year music student
customer_reviews.text: great 1st trumpet for a 1st year music student. cant beat the price, the case and the delivery! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: snake61

customer_reviews.title: A good first trumpet
customer_reviews.text: A good first trumpet, very affordable for those not really sure that they want to play an instrument
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. My 7yr old keeps it clean & stored in the case. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Berna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter needed a trumpet for first year band. Excellent sound & quality according to her band teacher.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Trumpet! Very reasonably priced and works very well. Very clear sound and easy for my 12 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my son loves the trumpet. It is the perfect size for kids in betters band
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Edmond

customer_reviews.title: A little tinny
customer_reviews.text: but it's a good value for what you're spending on it. It really is good for starters, but I would suggest a good cleaning and tightening of the valves before serious play. Blue Juice valve lube is also essential.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: 1st valve is a little sticky and 2nd valve is worse. It will need servicing. Edit: one year update, it was manageable if you kept it heavily oiled, but after letting it sit for a month. It's completely seized up. I can't even remove the valves without removing the lower caps and pushing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Southwade

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. My 5th grader is playing the trumpet in band this year, and he loves his new instrument. Good for beginners, great instrument for the price. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Family Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Oil leaked all over the place
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice trumpet. But the case got ruined from the oil leaking everywhere. The trumpet was all greasy even though it was in a bag. Unfortunately this item was needed for the very next day so I could not return it for another.. I couldn't get a picture since its an all black case. But the bag the oil came in was drenched and leaking. I think the bottle was almost empty..
customer_reviews.author: B. Levesque

customer_reviews.title: great trumpet really happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Received with no damage. My son and his teacher really like this trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Nance

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise this was a great beginner instrument for my middle school son
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 2 yrs then it received a dent near the buttons and would cost more to repair than replace. Otherwise this was a great beginner instrument for my middle school son.
customer_reviews.author: jBILL

customer_reviews.title: It didn't sound very good at first but with more practice it got better
customer_reviews.text: Well, this trumpet started out ok. It didn't sound very good at first but with more practice it got better. However, just after two weeks of playing, the middle note key got jammed (stuck in) and wouldn't release. After that, it was pretty much useless. Thus, we returned it and got instead a "Legacy Intermediate Trumpet" (about $50 more) and it actually sounded much better from the start. Thus, I would NOT recommend this trumpet to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Miami

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Nice for my son, perfect size and does what we purchased it for, and it a very good Trumpet to introduce the kids to Trumpet playing.
customer_reviews.author: Torta

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought the trumpet for our grandson. He is going to play in seventh grade band. We were pleasantly surprised when we opened the box. The trumpet is a very good looking and very good sounding instrument for the price. The carry case is also a very good piece of equipment that can be used/carried in several different positions. Overall the instrument seems to be more than worth the selling price.
customer_reviews.author: eddiep

customer_reviews.title: nice price and great buy
customer_reviews.text: Despite being warned repeatedly not to purchase an off brand instrument for my middle school band kid, I've found this instrument to be well built, durable and compable in sound quality to pricier models. My son just had his first band concert and there no difference whatsoever in his instrument versus others. Plus, my wallet is grateful. Don't fret over this buy, I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: pdandj

customer_reviews.title: Great Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet is exactly what I wanted at the price I was willing to pay. I am very pleased with it, and would highly reccomend this instrument for any one wanting to learn how to play.
customer_reviews.author: John Barth

customer_reviews.title: Great Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice trumpet for the price but some of the gold paint is a little chipped on one of the bars that holds it together other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, do not buy! Valves stick all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Valves stick continuously, regardless of how many times they are cleaned or oiled. Without functioning valves, trumpet is completely useless. Poor quality and no manufacturer info to contact them. This was a Christmas present for my son and turned out to be a complete waste of money. He's very disappointed as he cannot use the trumpet at all. Also when trumpet arrived, the included oil bottle was not completely closed and oil spilled all over the case. Entire case smells of valve oil.
customer_reviews.author: Emo

customer_reviews.title: Bach and Yamaha are the ones I recommend, they are pricey but can always be re-sold ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these Products! Any instrument that is this cheap, will not hold up, and is built very poorly. If you want to see your child be successful in music, start by spending alittle more money on a decent horn. Bach and Yamaha are the ones I recommend, they are pricey but can always be re-sold try looking for a used one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: As a music teacher, I suggest renting rather than purchasing this instrument. I've had students bring this brand in before and when it came time for monthly upkeep, the instrument couldn't be reassembled because the valves don't align. The two shops in my area couldn't find replacement parts. It'd be like trying to get Honda parts to fit in a Volvo. I've had to deliver bad news to my beginner students that their instrument isn't going to work anymore. It's worth investing in a recommended model from your students teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Colligan

customer_reviews.title: Le'Var Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and tone at a GREAT price! Beautiful looking horn and sturdy case. Would highly recommend to any student and parent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

product_meta.title: Le'Var BTRLV100 Student Trumpet
product_meta.description: Why rent, when you can buy. Le'Var has the perfect instrument for the trumpet student.Give the musician in your life a lovely gift with this trumpet. Features adjustable thumb rest to make playing more comfortable. The case protects the trumpet and is deigned to organize the polishing cloth and valve oil handy.Features: Slide Stops, Adjustable Thumb Rest Key (tuned): Bb Slide Length: 9.0 " Valve Type: Piston Bore Type: Cylindrical Bore Size: 0.46 " Body Material: Brass Bell Material: Brass Mouthpiece Material: Silver Plated Slide Material: Nickel Valve Material: Nickel Leadpipe Material: Brass Finish: Lacquered Includes: Polishing Cloth, Valve Oil, Case, White Gloves
feature_bullets: Brass Body, Brass Bell, Silver-Plated Mouthpiece, Nickel Slide, Brass Lead pipe
Includes: Polishing Cloth, Valve Oil, Case, White Gloves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
